DOC.brief_title: Opt-In Versus Opt-Out Colorectal Cancer Screening Outreach
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize control pilot study aim test different outreach strategy increase colorectal cancer screen use mailed fecal immunohistochemical testing ( FIT ) . The investigator randomize cohort subject age 50-74 2 arm : 1 . Opt-In - subject must actively choose receive home FIT kit . 2 . Opt-Out - FIT kit send default unless subject active chooses receive kit report prior screen .
